mapper.select: select p.no, p.createDate, p.title, p.img, p.salePrice, p.deliveryprice, p.deliveryStatus, o.orderNo, o.orderStatus from product p left join `order` o on (p.no = o.productNo) join member m on (p.memberNo=m.no) where m.id=#{id} order by p.no desc limit #{row},5

select p.*, o.orderNo, o.orderDate, o.deliveryAddr, o.paymentType, o.invoiceNo, o.deliveryComp, m1.name, m1.id, m1.phone from Product p join `Order` o On (o.productNo = p.no) join member m1 On (o.memberNo = m1.no) JOIN member m2 ON p.memberNo = m2.no where o.orderNo=#{orderNo} and m2.id=#{id}
